sentences.en: Carlos Ghosn, who runs Renault and Nissan, has looked at Jaguar too.
sentences.cn: 另外, 雷诺-日产的卡洛斯?戈恩对捷豹也是虎视眈眈.

sentences.en: Further hybrids under the Jaguar, Land Rover or Volvo brands could also be produced.
sentences.cn: Jaguar 、 LandRover或Volvo等品牌也将推出混合动力车.

sentences.en: He backed the Jaguar out of the sheltering trees.
sentences.cn: 他把杰格尔汽车倒出树丛.

sentences.en: He was green with envy when he saw my new Jaguar car.
sentences.cn: 看见我那辆美洲虎牌新车,他非常妒忌.

sentences.en: How can a giraffe more speedy than a jaguar?
sentences.cn: 如何能更快捷长颈鹿比美洲虎?

sentences.en: I'm only rash when I'm in my Jaguar.
sentences.cn: 我只是在开我的美洲虎车时才心急.

sentences.en: Is there competition between sympatric jaguar Panthera onca and puma Puma concolor?
sentences.cn: 同域栖息的美洲虎和美洲狮存在竞争 吗 ?

sentences.en: Jaguar shares climbed 43 pence to 510 pence.
sentences.cn: 捷豹汽车的股价攀升了43便士，达到510便士。

sentences.en: Know no fear: Jaguar knights are immune to feareffects.
sentences.cn: 无畏: 美洲虎骑士对恐惧效果免疫.

sentences.en: Luxury car firm Jaguar has thrown down the gauntlet to competitors by giving the best guarantee on the market.
sentences.cn: 豪华轿车生产商捷豹公司推出了市场上最诱人的保修服务，向竞争对手发出了挑战。

sentences.en: PAG also includes the Jaguar, Volvo and Aston Martin marques.
sentences.cn: PAG目前拥有捷豹 、 沃尔沃以及阿斯顿·马丁三大品牌.

sentences.en: Should you meet a jaguar in the jungle, just turn slowly, walk away. But slowly, never look back.
sentences.cn: 你在丛林中若碰上美洲虎, 就慢慢转身走开, 可一定要慢, 切莫回头看.

sentences.en: Some companies - such as Jaguar Collection - seek direct profits from licensed goods.
sentences.cn: 一些公司(如美洲虎系列产品公司)寻求从特许经营商品上获取直接利润.

sentences.en: Traffic was averagely light and the Jaguar performed superly.
sentences.cn: 来往车辆不多,杰格尔汽车运行极佳.

sentences.en: You're giving me a new Jaguar and you don't want anything?
sentences.cn: 你送我一辆新的积架却不用任何回馈?

trans.tran_cn: <动>（中、南美洲的）美洲虎，美洲豹
trans.tran_en: a large South American wild cat with brown and yellow fur with black spots
